{{disambig-more: '''''{{PAGENAME}}''''' is an 80 minute documentary by [[Robert Di Napoli]], released on [[4 December
The documentary covers such aspects of the Tolkien epic as its literary influences (including ''[[Beowulf (poem)
J.R.R. Tolkien: Beowulf]]''), character and plot analysis, inspirations on other arts (such as the progressive rock of the 1970s), and enduring popularity.

{{disambig-more: Features an art gallery booklet of [[the Brothers Hildebrandt]] and a music cd (''[[Landscapes of Middle-earth]]'') with [[Rick Wakeman]].
